sentence.Network_en: Southbound traffic tailed back for twenty miles on the M5 near Bristol.
sentence.Network_cn: 在布里斯托尔附近的5号高速公路上，南行的车辆排成了绵延20英里的长龙。

sentence.Network_en: Last year, economic growth tailed off to below four percent.
sentence.Network_cn: 去年，经济增长率下降到4%以下。

sentence.Network_en: He trusted her so little that he had her tailed.
sentence.Network_cn: 他十分不信任她，所以派人跟踪她。
